Package org.eclipse.e4.ui.css.core.dom

Interface ExtendedDocumentCSS

All Superinterfaces:
DocumentCSS, DocumentStyle
All Known Implementing Classes:
DocumentCSSImpl
public interface ExtendedDocumentCSS extends DocumentCSS
Extend DocumentCSS to add methods like add/remove style sheet.
